name: resume-scanner
description: AI-powered resume analysis and job matching platform

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m uvicorn app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m uvicorn app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m pytest
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m flake8 .
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c "from scripts.database import engine, Base; Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)"
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c "from scripts.database import engine, Base; Base.metadata.drop_all(bind=engine); Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)"

author: Resume Scanner Team
